ABOUT ME

Let me tell you a little about myself

Hi!

My name is Kai Erik Schieren, i am a 26 year old Oslo citizen with a passion for technology. When i am not writing code i like to play sports, games and hang out with my dog, Billy.

A couple of years back i decided to turn my passion into a career which put me where i am today. I have recently completed my bachelors degree in front-end and mobile development at HÃ¸yskolen Kristiania in Oslo. My degree naturally had a main focus on the front-end and mobile, but i have also been learning a lot about technologies in all parts of the stack, so i consider myself a fullstack developer with front-end expertise. There were also several courses on UX/UI, security and agile development methods, which is also something i find very interesting to work with.

Even though i am technically no longer a student i sort of look at myself as a forever-student in the sense that i love to learn new things, and that is why this ever changing industry fits me perfect.
